subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Need Volenters Test 2 and Info about ME
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I have been insanely busy for the last week or so.  I'll listen to both
of them this evening and respond directly to you, Mike.

Zack

On Fri, Jan 23, 2009 at 8:56 AM, Rj <rasterer@...> wrote:

>
> It's too bad you didn't get more participation.  I'd be happy to be part of
> the second test too.
>
> One thing I'd suggest: remove any question(s) that you are asking, from the
> audio file.  Since you're trying to study how different people will
> interpret the same file, and are trying not to give any hints as to what
> other people hear in the file, leaving the question in could be a factor
> there.  For example, if you are asking a yes/no question in the audio, then
> the people listening might be inclined to restrict their answers to having
> heard a "yes" or a "no" (because the question implies that is what may
> follow).  But by leaving the question out, you remove any hints as to what
> they should expect.
>
>
> --- On *Fri, 1/23/09, nightparanormalresearch <
> nightparanormalresearch@...>* wrote:
>
>
> From: nightparanormalresearch <nightparanormalresearch@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Need Volenters Test 2 and Info about ME
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Friday, January 23, 2009, 6:11 AM
>
>   The first test did not go so well participation levels were not so
> good and that may be partaly my fault so I would like to try this
> again .
> I have a different file I would like to privatly email to anyone
> willing to listen to it. All you have to do is send me what you hear
> and how clear it was to you.
>
> I dont know if I have ever made mention of this before but my time
> is extremly limited I work Mon-Thurs 6am till 5pm then go to school
> those days 630 till 930pm so fri sat and sun are the only days I have
> to answer emails or read the board. also igo by the screan name
> nightparanormalrese arch (obviosly).The name Northern IL Ghost Hunting
> Team is my wife Sarah we are both part of the same nonprofit
> organization here in our home town (N.I.G.H.T). So if iam a little
> busy I may have her answer somthing or post somthing if Iam unable
> otherwise youll always get me first thing friday and sat so if
> someone has a question on a post for me depending on what day it is
> you may have to wait till fri or sat.
> I just wanted to put that out ther so noone thinks Iam ignoring
> them or not answering emails.
> Now back to the test I will send out the new file to all those who
> participated in the last one and any one who would also like to
> participate let me know via email nightparanormalrese arch@yahoo. com<http://mc/compose?to=nightparanormalresearch%40yahoo.com>
> and i will gladly send it to you.If you participated on the last one
> but dont want to on this one just ignore the email ill be sending.
> Thank you to all those who have taken the time to listen to the
> first one and I truly apoligize that it was a bust but I think this
> one will be alot better as I have mor time to spend and i wont be
> rushing.
>
>
> 
>

I ha e been insanely busy o he las week o so.  I'll lis en o bo h o   hem his e ening and espond di ec ly  o you, Mike.
 
Zack
